song.title: Show Me Your Glory
song.lyrics:
[1] . Bm7 D Bm7 D I see the cloud, I step in .Bm7 D Em I want to see Your glory as Moses did || . Bm7 D Bm7 D Flashes of light, rolls of thunder
[P] . F#m G I'm not afraid . F#m G I'm not afraid
[C] . D A Show me your glory . F#m D Show me your glory ---
[2] . Bm7 D Bm7 D Im awed by your beauty, lost in your eyes .Bm7 D Em I want to walk in your presence, like Jesus did || . Bm7 D Bm7 D Your glory surrounds me, and I'm overwhelmed
[B] . D A I long to look on the face of the One that I love || . F#m D Long to stay in Your presence it's where I belong
song.presentation: 1 P C 2 P C B C
